Primary aim provide evidence TF-CBT exceed spontaneous remission posttraumatic stress symptom assess maintenance treatment gain 6 12 month post-treatment . Secondary aim evaluate effectiveness TF-CBT reduce psychopathology cognitive distortion patient caregiver explore moderator mediator treatment response . The trial contribute implement evidence-based treatment traumatized child across variety healthcare setting Germany . The novel aspect evaluate effectiveness TF-CBT broad range traumatize `` real-world '' patient context German mental healthcare system .
